content: I'll probably set up a category called "Luxury Treats" and start tracking my purchases from high-end brands like Gucci and Drunk Elephant. I've already noticed that I tend to splurge on these brands when I'm feeling stressed or celebrating a milestone, so I think setting a monthly budget for these purchases will help me be more mindful of my spending. Maybe I'll also implement that 30-day rule you mentioned to make sure I really need the item before buying it.
